I made this last week and it was freaking bomb. Like 5 types of mushrooms! Totally killer

attachments.title: Pressure Cooker Mushroom Risotto Recipe
attachments.text: The pressure cooker is the fastest and most reliable way to cook perfect risotto. This version comes out creamy and intensely flavored with fresh mushrooms and dried porcini. A touch of miso paste gives it savory depth.
